-----STARTING JOB, WEAPON, MAGIC-----

Starting weapon: Knife
Starting spell: Bolt
Starting ability: MgcSwrd Lv. 1

Temptation Song at Lix Charm -> Mythril Staff
Love Song at Istory Love -> Bronze Shield

Speed Song at Surgate Speed -> Red Lv.3
Magic Song at Ancient Library Magic -> Qrter

Fork Tower, two Magics Holy -> Life

5 potions in Wind Shrine, bottom left guy Potion -> Yoichi Bow
8 potions, Pirate after Torna Canal Key acquired Potion -> Silk robe
